*[[File:Zigzagoon.png|30px]]Zigzagoon }} ==Description== The '''Revive''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Revive has a value of 3 [[Diamonds]] {{Diamonds}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Mine Layout== The Revive appears in the Underground as a 3x3 sized object.

[[File:ReviveMine.png|100px]] ==Acquisition== Revives can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], as [[Rare Hold Items]] from [[File:Zigzagoon.png|30px]] Zigzagoon, and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Rock Tunnel|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Rocket Game Corner|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Pokemon Tower|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Seafoam Islands|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Union Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Ilex Forest|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Burned Tower|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Whirl Islands|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Mt Mortar|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Team Rockets Hideout|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Ice Path|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Dark Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Mt Silver|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Rusturf Tunnel|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Granite Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Shoal Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Cave of Origin|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Team Galactic Eterna Building|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Wayward Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Mt.
